entry.title: Remote work is killing big offices. Cities must change to survive
entry.quote: From London to São Paulo, from Boston to Berlin, there is an opportunity for the metropolis to emerge as something different, something equally essential, but perhaps more equitable, affordable, and humane. To get this transformation right, we can learn from the world of open-source software.

entry.title: Mandatory Student Spyware Is Creating a Perfect Storm of Human Rights Abuses
entry.quote: Another recent report, this one from Senator Warren’s office, concluded that student spyware apps are more dangerous than previously imagined. Their use in schools has disproportionately targeted students from marginalized communities and needlessly increased their contact with law enforcement.
